PerfectNetExp.abs: 统计局调查显示青少年喜欢抽一种名为『小雪茄』（cigarillo）的香烟，引起反对吸烟的团体和学者的担心。（Getty Images） 专家忧 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Spanish, diminutive of cigarro (see cigar)

means.word_mean: 1. small cigar or cigarette wrapped in tobacco instead of paper

auth_sentence.content: I coughed loudly and lit another cigarillo.

auth_sentence.content: I took out a cigarillo the one luxury I refused to give up and offered him one.

auth_sentence.content: "Different life," he said dully, and finally accepted a cigarillo from me.
